title: SXSW Road Closures
name: SXSW Road Closures
description: Mapping the downtown road closures during SXSW. RED indicates streets affected March 9-18 during film, music and interactive, BLUE indicates additional streets affected March 14 - 18 during the music festival (click for peak morning and delivery hours), PINK indicates various closures between March 12 and 18, and GREEN indicates lane reductions on various days from March 12 to March 18. Data from:  http://www.austintexas.gov/news/city-and-sxsw-announce-traffic-information-festival

properties.name: Northbound Congress Avenue reduced to two lanes between Seventh and Eighth streets
properties.description: reduced 10 a.m. until 11 p.m. daily from March 9-18

properties.name: Rainey Street District btwn Driskill and River Streets
properties.description: March 9 to 18 for the film, interactive and music festivals.closed 11 a.m. to 11 p.m. daily from March 10-11closed 6 p.m. to 3 a.m. daily from March 14-19 (residential and commercial access only, with parking pass required)

properties.name: East Sixth Street Closed except peak mornings and day deliveries
properties.description: Closed March 14 to 18 for the music festival.Open for drivers during the peak morning hours of 5 -10 a.m. March 14 and from 6 to 10 a.m. March 15-16. Commercial deliveries will also be allowed on Sixth and Red River streets every weekday between 10 a.m. and 4 p.m.
